title: 402: MomTok TikTok Swinging Scandal + Bach Nation News + The Good Alma!
itunes:title: 402: MomTok TikTok Swinging Scandal + Bach Nation News + The Good Alma!
description:
Today The Broads chat about Evan’s surgery, Bekah and Grayston’s wedding weekend, and discuss Bekah’s “The Good Alma” clothing launch with designer Andrew - AND THEN they deep dive into (00:47:00) the wild swinging TikTok drama that is MomTok with Taylor Frankie Paul and wrap up (01:25:00) with Bachelor Nation conversations about the Becca/Thomas engagement, their Arie prophecy, and Michelle/Nayte online drama! 

 

THE GOOD ALMA: 

Check out the new collection: https://thegoodalma.store/

 

ANDREW KOLCZYNSKI:

Follow Andrew on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@andrewnewyork 

Follow Andrew on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/andrew_newyork_/ 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***HELLO FRESH: Go to HELLOFRESH.COM/CHATTY16 and use code CHATTY16 for up to 16 free meals AND 3 free gifts!

***BLUELAND: Get 20% off your first order when you go to BLUELAND.COM/CHATTY 

***TALKSPACE: Go to TALKSPACE.COM and use promo code CHATTY during sign-up to get $100 off your first month!

***WONDERY’S “CALL ME CURIOUS”: Lsten to “Call Me Curious” at Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music or wherever you listen to podcasts or listen early and ad-free by subscribing to Wondery Plus in Apple Podcasts or on the Wondery app!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
